name: Sabura Quest
description:
Sabura Quest is a classic JRPG.

It is very storydriven and yes everything is written by me.

You will encounter lovable characters and hateble enemies.

You will fight to save Alron from being destroyed!

Sabura has taken over the castle and is infesting Alron with dark spawn from hell.

You, Edward son of Eldris need to destroy and completely banish Sabura to save Alron and the poeple that you love!

At this point you can only download the demo.
